item.title: How I Made This Blog
item.description: The idea of starting my own blog is one that has been on my mind for a couple of years now. I'm really happy that I finally decided to do something about it. The fate I have in mind for this blog is to contain the treasures I'll collect during my learning journey. The first topic on our hands is the creation of this blog. Technologies used: hugo nginx docker cloudflare Step by step process Creating the static files with hugo I knew that I didn't want to make a fancy site with custom css and I didn't really need to write my blogs in the web browser, so I decided to use a static site generator.
